name: @condict/x-sampa
description: Utility for converting X-SAMPA (ASCII-based phonetic notation) to IPA (international phonetic alphabet).
author: Alice Heurlin <alice.s.heurlin@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:data && npm run build:main
scripts.build:main: npm run compile && npm run copyData
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm install && npm run clean && npm run build
